name: LVE Perfume - Elegancia en Rojo
description: Comercial de lujo para perfume LVE protagonizado por modelo elegante en vestido rojo

subject.name: Modelo Principal
subject.description: elegant woman with long dark hair wearing a flowing red evening dress

product.name: LVE Perfume
product.description: luxury perfume bottle with gold accents and red liquid, elegant minimalist design

scenes.name: Entrada Elegante
scenes.prompt_template: {{subject}} walking gracefully through {{setting}}, {{camera_movement}}, {{lighting}}, elegant and confident

variables.setting: luxurious hotel lobby with white marble floors and floor-to-ceiling windows
variables.camera_movement: smooth tracking shot following from behind, slow dolly forward
variables.lighting: warm golden hour sunlight streaming through windows, soft shadows

scenes.action_details: Model walks with flowing dress movement, hair gently moving, confident stride

scenes.name: Revelación del Perfume
scenes.prompt_template: {{subject}} turns gracefully towards camera with {{emotion}}, {{camera_movement}}, revealing {{product}} in her hand, {{lighting}}

variables.camera_movement: slow zoom in to medium close-up
variables.lighting: soft key light on face, rim light on hair, product highlighted

scenes.action_details: Smooth turn, dress flowing, hand elegantly presenting perfume bottle, eye contact with camera

scenes.name: Momento Íntimo
scenes.prompt_template: Close-up of {{subject}} applying {{product}} to her neck, {{emotion}}, {{lighting}}, sensual and elegant moment

variables.emotion: eyes closed, serene expression, enjoying the moment
variables.lighting: soft diffused lighting, warm tones, focus on face and product

scenes.action_details: Delicate application of perfume, graceful hand movement, eyes closed in pleasure

scenes.name: Final Poderoso
scenes.prompt_template: {{subject}} with {{emotion}}, {{camera_movement}}, {{product}} prominently displayed, {{lighting}}, ending with brand reveal

variables.emotion: powerful confident gaze directly at camera
variables.camera_movement: slow pull back to reveal full scene
variables.lighting: dramatic lighting, spotlight on subject and product, dark elegant background

scenes.action_details: Model holds perfume bottle at chest level, direct eye contact, dress and hair perfectly styled
